page.title: 18FARMING INDUSTRY-DUNURE (2)
page.content: Fisherton Farm 300 acres has extensive range of buildings with slatted cubicle housing for 80 cattle and slatted sheds for beef cattle.Grain storage includes 5 twenty ton metal bins with cold air drying system run by Lister Deisel engine.Milk is produced by 82 dairy cattle,sold in bulk to Scottish Milk Marketing Board. Other livestock includes Welsh pony,225 breeding ewes,35 fat lambs,1 Hereford bull,11 beef cattle,44 heifers.Crops are 68 acres barley,4 acres potatoes,half acre carrots and 57 acres cut twice for silage. 8 acres wood,rest grazing and hill.Dunduff Farm 890 acres has stock of 150 breeding cows and 550 sheep.Grow 60 acres silage,20 acres barley and 15 acres hay for feeding stock.
